ThingDef.Name: TreeBase
ThingDef.description: A tree.

ThingDef.label: apple tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows apples and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: bamboo
ThingDef.description: A fast growing grass and wood alternative. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: banana tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows banana and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: beans
ThingDef.description: Common bean cooked up in many ways. Needs at least watered soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: blueberry bush
ThingDef.description: Blue colored berry that grows in bushes. Needs at least fertilized soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: carrots
ThingDef.description: A long orange vegetable that can be tricky to grow. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: cloudberry bush
ThingDef.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates. Needs at least watered soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: cocoa plant
ThingDef.description: Cocoa beans are refined into chocolate. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: coffee plant
ThingDef.description: A green, leafy planet yielding red cherries. These cherries contain seeds which, when ground, can be brewed into a tasty beverage. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: corn
ThingDef.description: A large grain plant which produces ears of delicious yellow seeds. Takes a relatively long time to grow, but yields lots of food, takes a long time to spoil, and can be happily eaten raw. Needs fertile soil to grow well. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: cotton bush
ThingDef.description: Yields cotton, a fine plant fiber used to make cloth. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: date palm tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows dates and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: devilstrand mushroom
ThingDef.description: This fragile mushroom was genetically engineered to produce a silk net of the highest grade. Long rumored to have mystical properties, it owes its name to the greed it inspires in people. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: eggplant
ThingDef.description: Purple variety of the eggplant. Bitter when eaten raw. Needs at least fertilized soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: gooseberry bush
ThingDef.description: A berry bush that grows well in cold climates. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: fig tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows figs and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: grape vine
ThingDef.description: A sweet small fruit that grows in small viney bushes. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: haygrass
ThingDef.description: A mixture of nutrient-rich grasses which yield large amounts of hay. Hay is edible for animals, but not humans. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: hops
ThingDef.description: A flowering plant that yields hops, and essential ingredient in beer. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: lettuce
ThingDef.description: A large, easily grown vegetable that's excellent for salads. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: mushrooms
ThingDef.description: This robust mushroom has been genetically engineered and cultivated to produce a filling meat substitute. Needs at least watered soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: oats
ThingDef.description: A cereal grain. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: OmniGel Plant
ThingDef.description: An OmniGel plant. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: onions
ThingDef.description: Warning can make you cry! Needs at least watered soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: orange tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows oranges and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: peach tree
ThingDef.description: A fruit bearing tree that grows peaches and is not destroyed when picked. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: pineapple plant
ThingDef.description: Think skin fruit that grows a top a bush. Needs at least watered soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: potato plant
ThingDef.description: A simple, highly nutritious tuber. Harvests quickly. A strong, versatile crop. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: pumpkins
ThingDef.description: Large orange version of the squash plant. Often carved to ward off ghosts. Needs at least fertilized soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: rice
ThingDef.description: A low grain plant that thrives in rich soil and yields food fast, but is not nice to eat uncooked. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: spectago flowers
ThingDef.description: One of the few known breeds of photochromic flowers, each petal of the Spectago changes color throughout the month depending on how much light they are exposed to. Used to brew spectago tea. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: squash
ThingDef.description: Yellow variety of the squash family. Needs at least fertilized soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: strawberries
ThingDef.description: A fragile but tasty fruit. Delicious even when raw. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: sugarcane
ThingDef.description: Cane plant refines into sugar. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: tea plant
ThingDef.description: A green leafy plant, who's leaves can be brewed into a tasty beverage. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: tobacco
ThingDef.description: A green, leafy member of the nighshade family. Harvests quickly. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: tomato vine
ThingDef.description: Distinctive red fruit. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: watermelons
ThingDef.description: This fruit is rich in vitamins A and C and can be eaten raw or cooked in a variety of ways. Needs enriched soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: wheat
ThingDef.description: Wheat is a cereal grain, harvested into raw wheat. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.

ThingDef.label: xerigium
ThingDef.description: This plant was selectively bred for centuries by settlers. It is sometimes also called "healer's hand" by tribespeople - a nickname it owes to its five major medicinal virtues. Needs at least cultivated soil to grow.
